title: Raspberry Ispahan macaron with lychee and rose ganache recipe
text:
These dainty little treats are a welcome addition to any teatime offering.

Prep time: 2 hours, plus freezing | Cooking time: 45 minutes

MAKES

around 72 macarons (or about 144 shells)

INGREDIENTS

For the raspberry jelly

420g raspberries

35g caster sugar

4g gelatine leaves

For the macaron shells

300g ground almonds

300g icing sugar

110g “liquefied” egg whites (see *)

4g approx. strawberry food colouring

4g approx. carmine red food colouring

300g caster sugar

75g mineral water

110g “liquefied” egg whites*

For the lychee and rose ganache
description: These dainty little treats are a welcome addition to any teatime offering.
